name: Mathematics Basics
text: An introductory exam covering fundamental math concepts.

name: Advanced Physics
text: A challenging exam focused on advanced physics topics.

name: World History Overview
text: A comprehensive exam on major historical events and figures.

name: Biology Fundamentals
text: Covers the basics of biology, including cell structure and genetics.

name: Calculus and Beyond
text: An in-depth exam on calculus concepts and applications.

name: Chemistry Essentials
text: Fundamental concepts of chemistry, including atomic structure and reactions.

name: European History Deep Dive
text: Detailed coverage of European history from the Renaissance to modern times.

name: Basic Geometry
text: Covers geometric shapes, theorems, and problem-solving techniques.

name: Earth Science Fundamentals
text: Introduces essential Earth science concepts, including geology and meteorology.

name: Modern World History
text: Examines global events and movements from the 20th century onward.
